subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Stephen Gostkowski, the most accurate kicker in the Patriots’ history, sent a 42-yard attempt wide left on the next to last play, and Arizona won at New England, 20-18.
snippet: Stephen Gostkowski, the most accurate kicker in the Patriots’ history, sent a 42-yard attempt wide left on the next to last play, and Arizona won at New England, 20-18.
